00026 // the constructor
00027 AbstractionDefinition::AbstractionDefinition(QDomDocument& doc):
00028 LibraryComponent(doc),
00029 busType_(), 
00030 ports_(), 
00031 extends_(), 
00032 attributes_() {
00033 
00034         LibraryComponent::vlnv_->setType(VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION);
00035 
00036         // find the IP-Xact root element (spirit:component or spirit:design ...)
00037         QDomNodeList nodeList = doc.childNodes();
00038         int i = 0;
00039         // search for the first element with children (=document type)
00040         while (!nodeList.at(i).hasChildNodes()) {
00041                 ++i;
00042         }
00043 
00044         QDomNode absNode = doc.childNodes().item(i);
00045 
00046         // set the attributes
00047         setXMLNameSpaceAttributes(attributes_);
00048 
00049         for (int i = 0; i < absNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00050                 QDomNode tempNode = absNode.childNodes().at(i);
00051 
00052                 if (tempNode.isComment()) {
00053                         continue;
00054                 }
00055 
00056                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:busType")) {
00057                         busType_ = General::createVLNV(tempNode, VLNV::BUSDEFINITION);
00058                 }
00059 
00060                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:extends")) {
00061                         extends_ = General::createVLNV(tempNode, VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION);
00062                 }
00063 
00064                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:ports")) {
00065 
00066                         // go through each port
00067                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00068                                 QDomNode portNode = tempNode.childNodes().at(j);
00069 
00070                                 // make sure the node is not comment
00071                                 if (!portNode.isComment()) {
00072                                         ports_.append(QSharedPointer<PortAbstraction>(
00073                                                         new PortAbstraction(portNode)));
00074                                 }
00075                         }
00076                 }
00077         }
00078 
00079         // if mandatory fields is missing
00080         if (!busType_.isValid()) {
00081                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:busType "
00082                                 "missing in spirit:abstractionDefinition"));
00083         }
00084 }
00085 
00086 AbstractionDefinition::AbstractionDefinition( const AbstractionDefinition& other ):
00087 LibraryComponent(other),
00088 busType_(other.busType_), 
00089 ports_(),
00090 extends_(other.extends_),
00091 attributes_(other.attributes_) {
00092 
00093         foreach (QSharedPointer<PortAbstraction> portAbs, other.ports_) {
00094                 
00095                 if (portAbs) {
00096                         QSharedPointer<PortAbstraction> copy = QSharedPointer<PortAbstraction>(
00097                                 new PortAbstraction(*portAbs.data()));
00098                         ports_.append(copy);
00099                 }
00100         }
00101 }

00111 AbstractionDefinition& AbstractionDefinition::operator=( const AbstractionDefinition& other ) {
00112         if (this != &other) {
00113                 LibraryComponent::operator=(other);
00114 
00115                 busType_ = other.busType_;
00116                 extends_ = other.extends_;
00117                 attributes_ = other.attributes_;
00118 
00119                 ports_.clear();
00120                 foreach (QSharedPointer<PortAbstraction> portAbs, other.ports_) {
00121 
00122                         if (portAbs) {
00123                                 QSharedPointer<PortAbstraction> copy = QSharedPointer<PortAbstraction>(
00124                                         new PortAbstraction(*portAbs.data()));
00125                                 ports_.append(copy);
00126                         }
00127                 }
00128         }
00129         return *this;
00130 }

00141 void AbstractionDefinition::write(QFile& file) {
00142         // create a writer instance and set it to operate on the given file
00143         QXmlStreamWriter writer(&file);
00144 
00145         // writer automatically adds whitespaces to make document more readable
00146         writer.setAutoFormatting(true);
00147         // writer uses one tab as indentation
00148         writer.setAutoFormattingIndent(-1);
00149 
00150         // call the base class implementation to write the top comment and
00151         // vlvn info. It also starts the <spirit:busDefinition> element
00152         LibraryComponent::write(writer);
00153 
00154         // set the attributes
00155         setXMLNameSpaceAttributes(attributes_);
00156 
00157         // write the attributes for the spirit:designConfiguration element
00158         General::writeAttributes(writer, attributes_);
00159 
00160         // call base class to write the VLNV info
00161         LibraryComponent::writeVLNV(writer);
00162 
00163         // if mandatory reference to a busDefinition is missing
00164         if (!busType_.isValid()) {
00165                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:busType is "
00166                                 "missing in spirit:abstractionDefinition"));
00167         }
00168         else {
00169                 writer.writeEmptyElement("spirit:busType");
00170                 General::writeVLNVAttributes(writer, &busType_);
00171         }
00172 
00173         // if extension is defined
00174         if (extends_.isValid()) {
00175                 writer.writeEmptyElement("spirit:extends");
00176                 General::writeVLNVAttributes(writer, &extends_);
00177         }
00178 
00179         if (!ports_.isEmpty()) {
00180                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:ports");
00181 
00182                 for (int i = 0; i < ports_.size(); ++i) {
00183                         ports_.at(i)->write(writer);
00184                 }
00185 
00186                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:ports
00187         }
00188 
00189         if (!LibraryComponent::description_.isEmpty()) {
00190                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:description",
00191                                 LibraryComponent::description_);
00192         }
00193 
00194         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:abstractionDefinition
00195         writer.writeEndDocument();
00196         return;
00197 
00198 }

00245 // abstractionDefinition does not have any dependency files, it is pure
00246 // IP-Xact element with only VLNV type dependencies
00247 const QStringList AbstractionDefinition::getDependentFiles() const {
00248         return QStringList();
00249 }
00250 
00251 const QList<VLNV> AbstractionDefinition::getDependentVLNVs() const {
00252         QList<VLNV> vlnvList;
00253 
00254         // append the busType element representing the busDefinition of this
00255         // abstraction definition
00256         if (busType_.isValid()) {
00257                 vlnvList.append(busType_);
00258         }
00259 
00260         // append the VLNV representing the abstractionDefinition that is
00261         // extended by this abstractionDefinition
00262         if (extends_.isValid()) {
00263                 vlnvList.append(extends_);
00264         }
00265 
00266         return vlnvList;
00267 }

00269 QStringList AbstractionDefinition::getPortNames() const {
00270 
00271         QStringList portNames;
00272 
00273         // go through each port and add it's logical name to the list.
00274         foreach (QSharedPointer<PortAbstraction> port, ports_) {
00275                 portNames.append(port->getLogicalName());
00276         }
00277         return portNames;
00278 }
00279 
00280 QStringList AbstractionDefinition::getPortNames( General::InterfaceMode mode ) const {
00281         QStringList portNames;
00282 
00283         // go through each port
00284         foreach (QSharedPointer<PortAbstraction> port, ports_) {
00285 
00286                 // if signal is required or optional in given mode
00287                 if (port->isRequired(mode) || port->isOptional(mode))
00288                         portNames.append(port->getLogicalName());
00289         }
00290         return portNames;
00291 }

00293 
00294 General::Direction AbstractionDefinition::getPortDirection( const QString& portName, 
00295                                                                                                                    General::InterfaceMode mode ) const {
00296         // search all ports 
00297         foreach (QSharedPointer<PortAbstraction> port, ports_) {
00298 
00299                 // if the named port was found
00300                 if (port && port->getLogicalName() == portName) {
00301                         return port->getDirection(mode);
00302                 }
00303         }
00304 
00305         // if no port with given name was found
00306         return General::DIRECTION_INVALID;
00307 }
00308 
00309 bool AbstractionDefinition::isRequired( const QString& portName, General::InterfaceMode mode ) const {
00310 
00311         // search all ports
00312         foreach (QSharedPointer<PortAbstraction> port, ports_) {
00313                 if (port->getLogicalName() == portName) {
00314                         return port->isRequired(mode);
00315                 }
00316         }
00317         return false;
00318 }

00320 bool AbstractionDefinition::isOptional( const QString& portName, General::InterfaceMode mode ) const {
00321         // search all ports
00322         foreach (QSharedPointer<PortAbstraction> port, ports_) {
00323                 if (port->getLogicalName() == portName) {
00324                         return port->isOptional(mode);
00325                 }
00326         }
00327         return false;

00330 bool AbstractionDefinition::isIllegal( const QString& portName, General::InterfaceMode mode ) const {
00331         // search all ports
00332         foreach (QSharedPointer<PortAbstraction> port, ports_) {
00333                 if (port->getLogicalName() == portName) {
00334                         return port->isIllegal(mode);
00335                 }

00340 bool AbstractionDefinition::hasPort( const QString& portName, General::InterfaceMode mode ) const {
00341         return isRequired(portName, mode) || isOptional(portName, mode);
00342 }

00344 int AbstractionDefinition::getPortSize( const QString& port, General::InterfaceMode mode ) const {
00345         // search all ports
00346         foreach (QSharedPointer<PortAbstraction> portAbs, ports_) {
00347                 if (portAbs->getLogicalName() == port) {
00348                         return portAbs->getWidth(mode);
00349                 }
00350         }
00351         return -1;
00352 }

00359 int AbstractionDefinition::getDefaultValue( const QString& portName ) const {
00360         // search all ports
00361         foreach (QSharedPointer<PortAbstraction> port, ports_) {
00362                 // if the port is the searched one
00363                 if (port->getLogicalName() == portName) {
00364                         return port->getDefaultValue();
00365                 }
00366         }
00367         // if port was not found
00368         return -1;
00369 }
00370 
00371 bool AbstractionDefinition::hasDefaultValue( const QString& portName ) const {
00372         // search all ports
00373         foreach (QSharedPointer<PortAbstraction> port, ports_) {
00374                 // if the port is the searched one
00375                 if (port->getLogicalName() == portName) {
00376                         return port->hasDefaultValue();
00377                 }
00378         }
00379         // if port was not found
00380         return false;
